thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core

Class Geometry

  • java.lang.Object
    • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core.GeometryBuffer
      • thothbot.parallax.core.shared.core.Geometry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Geometric
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CircleGeometry, CubeGeometry, CylinderGeometry, ExtrudeGeometry, LatheGeometry, ParametricGeometry, PlaneGeometry, PolyhedronGeometry, SphereGeometry, TorusGeometry, TorusKnotGeometry, TubeGeometry

    public class Geometry
extends GeometryBuffer
implements Geometric
    Base class for geometries 
     Geometry geometry = new Geometry();
 
 geometry.getVertices().add( new Vector3( -10, 10, 0 ) ); 
 geometry.getVertices().add( new Vector3( -10, -10, 0 ) );
 geometry.getVertices().add( new Vector3( 10, -10, 0 ) );  
 geometry.getFaces().add( new Face3( 0, 1, 2 ) );  
 
 geometry.computeBoundingSphere();
    Author:
    thothbot

      • setColors

        public void setColors(java.util.List<Color> colors)

      • getColors

        public java.util.List<Color> getColors()
        Gets List of vertex Colors, matching number and order of vertices.

        Used in ParticleSystem, Line and Ribbon.
        Meshes use per-face-use-of-vertex colors embedded directly in faces.

      • setFaces

        public void setFaces(java.util.List<Face3> faces)

      • getMorphTargets

        public java.util.List<Geometry.MorphTarget> getMorphTargets()
        Gets the List of Geometry.MorphTarget. Morph vertices match number and order of primary vertices.

      • getMorphNormals

        public java.util.List<Geometry.MorphNormal> getMorphNormals()

      • getMorphColors

        public java.util.List<Geometry.MorphColor> getMorphColors()
        Gets the List of Geometry.MorphColor. Morph colors have similar structure as Geometry.MorphTarget. Morph colors can match either number and order of faces (face colors) or number of vertices (vertex colors).

      • getFaceVertexUvs

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<java.util.List<UV>>> getFaceVertexUvs()
        Gets the List of face UV layers. Each UV layer is an List of UV matching order and number of vertices in faces.

      • computeVertexNormals

        public void computeVertexNormals()
        Computes vertex normals by averaging face normals. Face normals must be existing / computed beforehand.
        Specified by:
        computeVertexNormals in interface Geometric
        Overrides:
        computeVertexNormals in class GeometryBuffer

      • computeTangents

        public void computeTangents()
        Computes vertex tangents.
        Based on terathon.com

        Geometry must have vertex UVs (layer 0 will be used).

        Specified by:
        computeTangents in interface Geometric
        Overrides:
        computeTangents in class GeometryBuffer

      • computeBoundingBox

        public void computeBoundingBox()
        Computes bounding box of the geometry.
        Specified by:
        computeBoundingBox in interface Geometric
        Overrides:
        computeBoundingBox in class GeometryBuffer

      • computeBoundingSphere

        public void computeBoundingSphere()
        Computes bounding sphere of the geometry.

        Neither bounding boxes or bounding spheres are computed by default. They need to be explicitly computed, otherwise they are null.

        Specified by:
        computeBoundingSphere in interface Geometric
        Overrides:
        computeBoundingSphere in class GeometryBuffer

      • applyMatrix

        public void applyMatrix(Matrix4 matrix)
        Makes matrix transform directly into vertex coordinates.

      • mergeVertices

        public int mergeVertices()
        Checks for duplicate vertices with hashmap. Duplicated vertices are removed and faces' vertices are updated.

        public Geometry clone()
